articles.author: Heidi Parker
articles.title: His father is an Eighties movie star who is still popular, his mother is an Emmy winner, who is he? - Daily Mail
articles.description: His dad is an Eighties icon who has starred in several musicals and romantic comedies, his mom is a film and TV star who has worked with Julia Roberts. There is also an Andy Warhol link. Who is he?
articles.content:
His dad is an Eighties icon who has starred in several musicals and romantic comedies, yet he has a serious side as well and has earned rave reviews for his dramas.
He continues to act and is a hous… [+7077 chars]

articles.author: Katherine McPhillips
articles.title: Prince Harry made a 'subtle gesture of love' towards Meghan while in court in the UK - Express
articles.description: Prince Harry has recently been in the UK attending a court trial, and royal experts have noticed that his outfit may have been a touching tribute to his wife, Meghan Markle.
